extendedInfo.description: Pride of India-Indian Screen Flashlight-This is free Version and does not have any ads.You can show your patriotism and pride of your country.Let the national flag of India adorn as your phone Screen flashlight.This is your national flag screen flashlight, which is bright enough for daily use. You can use it as your primary flashlight option in case your device doesnât have a camera flashlight or you want to save the battery.It will be useful when you are walking or reading something at night, so your national flag will give you the brightness.This application has another function.Simply press the center of Dharma-cakra on the flag to hear Jana Gana Mana, the national anthem of India. You can use it in sport competitions such as Olympic games, World Cup or International Competitions.This is no ads and free version application.If you like it, please support us.Thank you. ^^Keyword : screen, flashlight, national flag, India, Indian, Olympic, World cup, Football, Soccer, international competition, Jana Gana Mana, national anthem

reviews.title: Feeling proud.
reviews.comment: Just patriotism!  4.5 stars as it could be better if our flag is highlighted with some strobe effect otherwise looks good at max brightness. Thanks for the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best !!! Well done !!!
reviews.comment: Jai Hind !!! Thank you very much from all Indian brothers and sisters . Great !!!! Keep it up !!!
reviews.author: JATIN SHARMA
